QUESTAO 39


Q:Faça o quadro de memória e mostre a saída na tela:


x1(004019C0)(6422356)(00401A1B) x2(4200896)(00BC1588) x3(00000000)(12326296)(00400080)ÔÇØ, x1, *x1, &x1, x2, &x2, x3, *x3, &x3
x1(004019C0)(6422356)(00401A1B) x2(4200896)(00BC1588) x3(00000000)(12326296)(00400080)ÔÇØ, x1, *x1, &x1, x2, &x2, x3, *x3, &x3
x1(004019C0)(6422356)(00401A1B) x2(4200896)(00000014) x3(00000000)(12326296)(00400080)ÔÇØ, x1, *x1, &x1, x2, &x2, x3, *x3, &x3
